position.marginalia_text: De ductoria planetaru[m]. fo. 170.v. Reflexio et tra[n]slatio luminis fo. 177. fo. 169. figura[e] dominus 168.v. 208.v. primus / secundus / et tertius domin[us] alicui[us] dom[us]. 281 et fo 236..v. Chronocrator / fo 149 // Alfridaria. particularis et generalis 156.v. Dominis genitur[a]e duplex. 135.v/ Partes 296.

marginalia.translation: On the position of power (ductoria) of planets, folio 170 verso. The reflection and translation of the light, folio 177 [and] folio 169. The lord of the figure, [folio] 168 verso [and] 208 verso. The first, second and third lord of any house, [folio] 281 and folio 236 verso. Chronocrator ("time-lord"), folio 149. The Alfridaries, particular and general, [folio] 156 verso. The double [nature?] of the lord of a geniture, [folio] 135 verso. Parts, [folio] 296.
